name: LocalBot
0:
”Alexa, open Local Bot”
”Alexa, open local bot for what's new in seattle washington”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: local bot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Which city or town do you care about the most? Want to take a “news voyage” to your hometown? Local Bot is a smart local news voice assistant that delivers free local updates to you, and it allows you to be informed with the fastest local news in a variety of regions in the U.S.

Just make sure to put in the correct location, Local Bot will surprise you by being the flash local news reporter that gives you customized brief in light speed.

FEEDBACK
Email us at localbriefing@gmail.com if you have any issues or feedback. We'd love to hear from you!
